physical_appearance:\The image shows a rectangular print. There are 3 sets of images
 one on top of the other
 that are being depicted. \\Chinese Passengers to hong Kong\\ is stated below the image closest to the bottom of the print. \\Arrival at Hong Kong\\ is stated below the middle image of the print. \\The Cook\\
subject_terms_1:\\The Doctor\\ race (group of people) migrations (events) professions junks (vessels)
subject_terms_2:\\The Banker\\ Chinese Migrations Singapore Hong Kong (China) Professions Junks
subject_terms_3:and \\from sketches from J.F.\\ are stated in the top image of the print. The top image shows three Chinese individuals Migration
subject_terms_4:each of a different profession. The cook and the doctor are shown to be sitting barefoot on the floor while the banker sits on a chair in a Changshan. The middle image shows numerous junk ships and boats over a body of water. The one closest to the foreground contains numerous Chinese people. The bottom image focuses on the deck of a junk ship
context_1:showing numerous Chinese people. Some of them are lying down while others are standing up.  \
